name: A lesson of ducking BFG9000!
description: My first released product. A level with a Dehacked 3.0 patch that turns a monster into Green marines that Fires BFG9000 to you! This is a small level, with everything that you need to learn about ducking enemy's BFG9000! I also sometimes use this to practise it. see DUCK.TXT for more details. And the cheat codes I am not going to tell you... You will need DOOM ][ v1.7 to play Demos and Dehacked patches.
